Author: mithro_
Content: The IP address changes are needed due to changes in my networking.

Author: mithro_
Content: @bunnie - I notice the boards have that USB connector and chip, is that just a UART or could that be used to program things too? @Tisham Dhar (CSIRO EASI)  Does that USB exist on the 35t boards too?

Author: tishamdhar
Content: Yea the 35T has an FTDI chip and a USB connector, I was wondering if that was an on-board JTAG

Author: tishamdhar
Content: I haven't tested the CH347 with 35T yet. Was just confirming the wiring

Author: bunnievorpal
Content: you mean the microUSB connector to the right of the HDMI connector? it's just a pair of FPGA pins brought out to a microUSB.

Author: bunnievorpal
Content: i think the idea is that if you wanted to add e.g. a valentyUSB core to it you could do so
